name: Air Hockey - Rival Showdown
description:
Air Hockey brings you adrenaline pumping sport game. Challenge your friends on 2-player mode or have fun play with the computer opponent.

FEATURES:
* 2-player mode (on the same device).
* 1-player mode with computer opponents (3 difficulty levels)
* 2 theme tables, hockey, glow
* Excellent sound, effects, and vibrate (on supported devices)
* Realistic physics
* 4 selectable paddles and pucks

PREMIUM VERSION:
* 4 more in premium version, football, basketball, ice, and space
* Quick play mode in premium version
* No More Ads.
